title: Local SEO - SEO Blog by Ahrefs
description: Local SEO is about improving search engine rankings for your website and business profiles to attract business from local search queries. Check out the resources below to start improving your business's online presence.

Check out the resources below to start improving your business's online presence.Our Best Articles on Local SEO We handpicked these from the 250+ posts on the blog. Local SEO: The Complete Guide Local SEO is improving your online presence to get more business from local searches—and it focuses on optimizing for Google users. How to Build Local Citations (Complete Guide) Help more people to discover your local business online with citations. How to Optimize Your Google My Business Listing in 30 Minutes Improve rankings and visibility for your Google Business profile. How to Do Local Keyword Research Find keywords that people search for when looking for local products and services.
